He howls in fury, but little real damage is done (in this mode he has 
3 weaknesses 1 is silver and I'll never tell you the other 2 unless 
you beat me up one heck of alot worse than in 6th grade).  He slashes 
and bites madly at Auron.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "auron3xx" <auron3xx@y...> wrote:
> As Auron senses the huge powerful evil serge of energy coming befoer 
> he actualy sees it he is some what prepared to a open attack as his 
> pointed ears hear the large howl he turns slugisly around facing his 
> opponent his red icy eyes starte at his opponent as he jumps in the 
> air ready to destroy Auron. "Fool never do such a straightfoward 
> attack" Auron says as the claws come down upon where he is with his 
> dark black wings extended behind him he brings up his hands floating 
> in the air. As the hands cuple together vying for domination over 
> each other Auron senses he is losing this match of brute strenght as 
> his arms begsin to buckle "Hum nice strenght" he grunts under his 
> breath as his joints creak allitle. "But you have left yourself 
open" 
> as he says this his chest begins to open revealing a small yet 
> powerful gun built into it. "Now feel my rath" as he says this a 
ball 
> of energy begins building near the end of it. As it builds into a 
> huge black ball of energy it seems as if electricity is running from 
> it as its power serges, "Now feel this" he says as he releases it 
> while holding night menace. As the ball is fired at him he holds on 
> with all of his might so that there will be hardly any escape
>
